response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This extraordinary item is not just a product; it's a testament to innovation and quality. Given its unique features and exceptional craftsmanship, we believe its true value lies far beyond its face value. We are offering this remarkable piece to you at an exclusive price of $12,000. This opportunity is not only about acquiring a product but also investing in a legacy of excellence. Please let us know if you would like to explore this opportunity further.", "product_price": 12000}
